AT.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
AT.description: Jede Welt braucht Helden. Und die findet man oft, wo man sie nicht vermutet. Erlebe ein neues Abenteuer mit Wilbur, Ivo, Nate und dem Vieh in der schrägsten aller Fantasy-Welten, voll mit verrückten Charakteren und Pop-Culture Referenzen. </br> Das neue Adventure-Game von KING Art, den Machern von The Book of Unwritten Tales, Die Vieh Chroniken und The Raven – Vermächtnis eines Meisterdiebs. Mehr als 20 Stunden lustige Dialoge mit bekannten deutschen Sprechern und vielen verrückten Rätseln!

AU.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
AU.description: Every world needs its heroes. However unlikely they may seem. Join Wilbur, Ivo, Nate and Critter in another adventure full of quirky characters and pop-culture references in the wicked world of Aventásia. Help them fulfill their destiny. A destiny as yet unwritten.</br> From KING Art, the creators of The Book of Unwritten Tales, The Critter Chronicles and The Raven – Legacy of a Master Thief. Over 20 hours of funny dialogues, top-notch voice acting and weird puzzles!

BG.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2

BE.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
BE.description: Chaque monde a besoin de ses propres héros. Même s'ils semblent totalement improbables. Rejoignez Wilbur, Ivo, Nate et Critter pour une autre aventure pleine de personnages excentriques et de références à la pop-culture dans le monde incroyable d'Aventasia. Aidez-les à accomplir leur destinée. Une destinée encore non écrite. </br> De KING Art, les créateurs de The Book of Unwritten Tales, The Critter Chronicles et The Raven – Legacy of a Master Thief. Plus de 20 heures de dialogues délirants, de doublage de grande qualité et d'énigmes farfelues !

EE.description: Every world needs its heroes. However unlikely they may seem. ES.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
ES.description: Cada mundo necesita a sus héroes, por muy insólitos que parezcan. Únete a Wilbur, Ivo, Nate y Critter en otra aventura repleta de personajes extravagantes y referencias a la cultura popular en el retorcido mundo de Aventásia. Ayúdales a cumplir su destino; un destino aún sin escribir. </br> De la mano de KING Art, el estudio creador de The Book of Unwritten Tales, The Critter Chronicles y The Raven – Legacy of a Master Thief. ¡Más de veinte horas de diálogos desternillantes, un doblaje excelente y extraños rompecabezas!

IT.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
IT.description: Ogni mondo ha bisogno di eroi, per quanto improbabili. Unisciti a Wilbur, Ivo, Nate e Critter per una nuova avventura piena di strani personaggi e riferimenti alla cultura pop nel malvagio mondo di Aventásia. Aiutali a compiere il proprio destino. Un destino ancora tutto da scrivere. </br> Da KING Art, i creatori di The Book of Unwritten Tales, The Critter Chronicles e The Raven – Legacy of a Master Thief. Più di 20 ore di dialoghi spassosi, doppiaggio di alta qualità e strani enigmi!

NL.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
NL.description: De legendes verhaalden er al van. Profetieën voorspelden het. De uitverkorenen geloofden erin. De avonturensaga gaat verder. Ga weer samen met Wilbur, Ivo, Nate en Critter in de gevaarlijke wereld Aventasia op een klassiek avontuur. Help ze hun lotsbestemming te vervullen. Een nog onbekende lotsbestemming.

NZ.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2

Over 20 hours of funny dialogues, top-notch voice acting and weird puzzles!

PT.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
PT.description: Todos os mundos precisam dos seus heróis, por muito improváveis que sejam. Junta-te a Wilbur, Ivo, Nate e Critter em mais uma aventura repleta de personagens excêntricas e referências de cultura pop no mundo perverso de Aventásia. Ajuda-os a cumprir o seu destino. Um destino ainda por escrever. </br> Da KING Art, os criadores de The Book of Unwritten Tales, The Critter Chronicles e The Raven – Legacy of a Master Thief. Mais de 20 horas de diálogos engraçados, interpretações vocais de topo e puzzles estranhos!

RU.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
RU.description: Каждому миру нужны свои герои. Даже если на героев они совсем не похожи. Wilbur, Ivo, Nate и Critter отправляются в очередное путешествие по опасному миру Aventásia, полному причудливых персонажей и отсылок к поп-культуре. Помогите храбрецам исполнить предназначение... которое пока никому не известно. </br> От KING Art, создателей «The Book of Unwritten Tales», «The Critter Chronicles» и «The Raven — Legacy of a Master Thief». Более 20 часов увлекательных диалогов, первоклассной озвучки и необычных загадок!
